page.title: 04TOURIST ATRACTIONS
page.content:
There is a small permanent holiday caravan site at stoke house. This is a very pleasant site with a small beach but planning regulations forbid expansion and there is no exploitatin.
{ N.B. THERE ARE NO TOURING CARAVAN { SITES.
{ Keaton Farm offers Bed and { Breakfast.
There are no harbour or launching facilities but small{boats}visit the area for mackerel fishing,crab and lobster pots,diving with snorkels and compressed air. {Parish footpaths}inland connecting with the South Devon Coastal Footpath, this is one of the least spoilt and most picturesque sections of the Coastal Footpath.
